name: Tapas Roy
body:
**Name :** Tapas Roy **Address :** Village : Narayanpur, P.S. - Gangarampur, District : South Dinajpur **Support Period :** Beneficiary since 2015 **Mentor :** Pratik Kumar Das (Jadavpur University, Kolkata) **Educational Backgroud :** Madhymaik : 91% ; Higher Secondary : 83.4% **Present Course :** Geological Sciences (UG II), Jadavpur University

Tapas comes from the village of Gangarampur in South Dinajpur. In a family of six, which includes his grandparents and his sister, the sole earning member is his father who is a daily labourer. Tapas finished his schooling from Balurghat, while residing at one of his teacherâ€™s house. In spite of adverse circumstances, Tapas scored 91% in Madhyamik and 83.4% in the Higher Secondary Examinations. Finally, he made it to Jadavpur University (in 2015) where he is in his second year now studying Geology. Srijan Sujan has stood by Tapas since the start of his university days.

_To view the academic documents of Tapas Roy please download the zip file or the tar file from the link the top._
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
